mapper.insert: insert into qna_reply(reply_no, reply_writer, reply_contents, reply_wdate, qna_no) values(qna_reply_seq.nextval, #{reply_writer}, #{reply_contents}, sysdate, #{qna_no})
mapper.select: select reply_no, reply_writer, reply_contents, reply_wdate, qna_no from qna_reply where qna_no = #{qna_no} order by reply_no desc
select count(*) from qna_reply where qna_no=#{qna_no}
select qna_no from qna_reply where reply_no = #{reply_no}
